privateChannel.bannerHeader: This is a private channel. You must be a member to view the channel content

channelModal.channelNameMinChars: Channel name must be at least 2 characters long
channelModal.channelNameNoSpecialChars: Channel name cannot contain special characters

publicDescription: Anyone can see who’s in the channel and what they post. Anyone can join this channel
privateDescription: Only members can see who’s in the channel and what they post. Anyone can ask to join from the Channel discovery.
joinRequestError: Something went wrong. Please try again!
joinPrivateChannelRequestSuccess: Request to join channel sent successfully

noChannelsYet.message: Channels created will be visible here
